name: The Pebble of Kajaro
tooltip:
The Pebble of KajaroLevel 60

Hakkari fear you, <name>. They speak of horrors they believed that only their faceless God could perpetrate. You have burned them with the force of Kajaro. They now know fear in two places.

It is time to further strengthen the pebble. Hand me the talisman.

Requirements:
- Pebble of Kajaro
